column4: Can anyone tell me how to partition hda1? I have Ubuntu installed on both hda1 and hdb1 and want to partition hda1 from my Ubuntu install on hdb1.
what do you have on partition hda1?
Ubuntu and a lot of media files.
I want to seperate the media files and the Ubuntu install so that I can wipe out ubuntu. i'm running ubuntu on hdb1 now.
